item.description:
SOLD OUT! REGISTRATIONS ARE CLOSED!

Thank you to LaQuinta and Meetcha for sponsoring this event! Click through to their sites on the right...

Partial funds are going to Haiti Relief Efforts!

Cost is $10 per person, collected at the door
Includes: Pizza, Salad, Soda, Beer and Wine
Please bring only $10 bills. No checks or credit cards please.

This event is a fundraiser for our annual subscription and other expenses to run events. Also for Haiti Relief Efforts


Sponsors for this event:
La Quinta Inn Milford - thank you for donating the room and some wonderful raffle prizes!
MEETCHA - thank you for your donation to help support our fundraising efforts www.meetchacom .

Meetup is on a mission along with the rest of the community and country to raise money and help out. Please look at this site: http://meetupblog.mee...

We will be hand delivering the funds to the Red Cross


Do you have a talent
Do you have a gift
Come to La Quinta in Milford
For a great big lift

You will laugh
You will be entertained - live
Not by any professionals
But by singles and others over thirty five

On Saturday, January twenty three
You will have a great opportunity

To show off your talent to your fellow meetup members

Go with the flow
and be in the very first annual meetup talent show

Can you sing, can you dance, can you juggle, can you play an instrument, can you tell a good joke, can you do magic, can you do anything?

That’s right, anything is acceptable, within good taste of course, for your first annual meetup talent show.

But, if you can’t do anything, you have no talent at all,
You can still come, like Cinderella at the ball

Enjoy pizza, soda, beer and wine
Just be a part of the audience, which is fine

An email went out by Linda, The Meetup Queen
Asking you to donate your time, your talent, and to be part of the scene

If you haven’t yet signed up with your RSVP
Be sure to do so, and don’t forget to pay the fee

Help us make this a great event
Show off your gifts, your skills and your great talent
item.name: Very First MeetupTalent Show!
